title: Custom Website Development
text: High-performance, conversion-focused websites built with Next.js for modern businesses.

detailPage.heroTitle: Web Development Solutions That Power Your Digital Growth
detailPage.heroSubTitle: At Solvorr Tech, we build high-performance, scalable, and conversion-optimized websites tailored to your business goals. From landing pages to complete corporate sites, every build is crafted for speed, performance, and long-term scalability.

overview.title: Building Digital Solutions That Drive Real Business Impact
overview.subTitle: We merge design, performance, and user experience to create websites that not only look great but also convert.
description: Your website is your digital foundation — and we ensure it works as hard as you do.

Every website we build is designed for fast loading, high engagement, SEO visibility, and long-term growth. Whether you're a small business or a scaling brand, our websites are built to empower your success.

subServices.title: Corporate Website Development
subServices.description: Professional corporate sites built for credibility, trust, and conversions — tailored for growing businesses and startups.

subServices.title: Landing Page Design & Development
subServices.description: High-converting landing pages designed for product launches, lead generation, and marketing campaigns.

subServices.title: Responsive Web Design
subServices.description: Pixel-perfect responsive websites that perform flawlessly across all devices and screens.

subServices.title: Single Page Applications (SPA)
subServices.description: Ultra-fast single-page applications with smooth transitions, instant loading, and seamless UX.

subServices.title: Web Portal Development
subServices.description: Custom role-based portals for employees, partners, or customers with secure authentication.

subServices.title: E-Commerce Websites
subServices.description: Modern e-commerce solutions with secure payments, product management, and optimized checkout flows.

serviceBenefits.title: Custom-Built, No Templates
serviceBenefits.description: Every website is tailored specifically to your brand, needs, and goals — crafted from scratch.

serviceBenefits.title: Lightning-Fast Performance
serviceBenefits.description: Optimized code, image compression, caching, and Next.js rendering ensure blazing load times.

serviceBenefits.title: SEO-Friendly Architecture
serviceBenefits.description: Technical SEO foundations baked into every page for better visibility and organic ranking.

serviceBenefits.title: Scalable & Future-Ready
serviceBenefits.description: Easily extend your website in the future without needing a full rebuild.

serviceBenefits.title: Conversion-Optimized UX
serviceBenefits.description: Clean layouts, strong CTAs, and intuitive user journeys built to maximize conversions.

serviceProccess.title: Discovery & Strategy
serviceProccess.description: We begin with understanding your goals, customers, and vision to create a clear project roadmap.

serviceProccess.title: Design & UX Planning
serviceProccess.description: We craft clean, modern, and user-focused designs aligned with your brand identity.

serviceProccess.title: Development
serviceProccess.description: Using Next.js and modern tools, we build scalable, fast, and secure websites.

serviceProccess.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
serviceProccess.description: Your website is tested for performance, security, responsiveness, accessibility, and stability.

serviceProccess.title: Launch & Ongoing Support
serviceProccess.description: We monitor, optimize, and maintain your website for continuous growth.

title: Dashboard & Web App Development
text: We build powerful dashboards, internal tools, and scalable web applications designed to streamline operations.

detailPage.heroTitle: Powerful Dashboards & Web Applications for Modern Businesses
detailPage.heroSubTitle: We design and develop custom dashboards and web apps that automate workflows, visualize data, and streamline daily operations.

overview.title: Custom Dashboards Built Around Your Business
overview.subTitle: From analytics dashboards to internal CRMs — we build tools that save time, boost productivity, and unlock business insights.
description: Your business needs systems that adapt to your workflow — not the other way around.
We build dashboards and full-featured web apps with custom logic, user roles, powerful data handling, and clean design.

subServices.title: Analytics Dashboards
subServices.description: Custom dashboards with charts, KPIs, and performance metrics to help you understand your business in real-time.

subServices.title: Admin Panels
subServices.description: Feature-rich admin systems with secure authentication, role-based access control, and complete data management.

subServices.title: Internal Tools & CRMs
subServices.description: Custom-built CRMs, project management tools, and workflow systems tailored to your internal processes.

subServices.title: SaaS Web Apps
subServices.description: Build and launch your SaaS idea with user auth, subscriptions, and scalable architecture.

subServices.title: Data Management Interfaces
subServices.description: Easy-to-use interfaces that allow your team to manage and update data without technical knowledge.

serviceBenefits.title: Automation That Saves Hours
serviceBenefits.description: Reduce manual work with digital tools that automate repetitive business processes.

serviceBenefits.title: Real-Time Visibility
serviceBenefits.description: Powerful dashboards help you see insights instantly and make better decisions faster.

serviceBenefits.title: Smart Access Control
serviceBenefits.description: Admin, staff, and client roles with secure login and permission systems.

serviceBenefits.title: Built for Scale
serviceBenefits.description: Your dashboards grow with your business — add more modules anytime.

serviceProccess.title: Requirement Analysis
serviceProccess.description: We identify your workflows, data needs, and automation opportunities.

serviceProccess.title: UI/UX Wireframing
serviceProccess.description: We design structured dashboards with clear navigation and intuitive layouts.

serviceProccess.title: Development
serviceProccess.description: We build using Next.js, Node.js, and modern databases for speed and reliability.

serviceProccess.title: Testing
serviceProccess.description: Every feature is tested for accuracy, security, and device compatibility.

serviceProccess.title: Deployment & Support
serviceProccess.description: Your dashboard is deployed to a cloud environment and monitored for performance.

title: Business Automation Systems
text: Automate repetitive tasks, streamline operations, and save time with custom business automation.

detailPage.heroSubTitle: We build custom automation solutions that reduce manual work, increase efficiency, and streamline your processes.

overview.title: Automation Tailored to Your Business Needs
overview.subTitle: From lead automation to internal workflow systems — we help businesses save hours every week.
description: Manual repetitive tasks slow down your business.
We build smart automation systems that connect your tools, streamline your workflows, and reduce operational inefficiencies.

subServices.title: Lead Automation
subServices.description: Automatically route leads to WhatsApp, email, CRM, or dashboards.

subServices.title: Booking & Appointment Automation
subServices.description: Automate bookings and sync appointments with Google Calendar.

subServices.title: Email & Notification Automation
subServices.description: Send automatic alerts, confirmations, or updates to customers.

subServices.title: Data Synchronization
subServices.description: Auto-sync data between website forms, Google Sheets, dashboards, or APIs.

subServices.title: AI-Assisted Automations
subServices.description: Use AI to handle responses, generate summaries, or categorize data.

serviceBenefits.title: Save Hours of Manual Effort
serviceBenefits.description: Reduce the workload on your team by automating repeat tasks.

serviceBenefits.title: Zero Human Error
serviceBenefits.description: Automations ensure data accuracy and eliminate mistakes.

serviceBenefits.title: Real-Time Execution
serviceBenefits.description: Your workflows run instantly — no delays.

serviceBenefits.title: Works With Your Existing Tools
serviceBenefits.description: Integrates with WhatsApp, Gmail, Google Sheets, CRMs, APIs, and more.

serviceProccess.title: Workflow Mapping
serviceProccess.description: We identify tasks and processes that can be automated.

serviceProccess.title: System Planning
serviceProccess.description: We design an efficient automation architecture around your goals.

serviceProccess.title: Automation Development
serviceProccess.description: We implement backend logic, APIs, and integrations.

serviceProccess.title: Testing
serviceProccess.description: We ensure the automation runs reliably in all conditions.

serviceProccess.title: Deployment & Monitoring
serviceProccess.description: We deploy to the cloud and monitor performance for continuous operation.

title: API Development & Integration
text: Secure, reliable, and scalable APIs that connect your systems and enable seamless data communication.

detailPage.heroSubTitle: We build secure, scalable APIs and integrate third-party systems to enable smooth data communication across your business.

overview.title: Build Strong Connections With Powerful APIs
overview.subTitle: APIs are the bridge that connects your business tools — and we make sure that bridge is powerful, secure, and future-ready.
description: Whether you need REST APIs, custom integrations, or system communication — we build backend solutions that are clean, scalable, and reliable.
Our APIs ensure your website, dashboard, and automations work seamlessly together with zero downtime.

subServices.title: Custom REST API Development
subServices.description: High-performance APIs designed specifically for your business logic and data flow.

subServices.title: Third-Party Integrations
subServices.description: Integrate Stripe, PayPal, WhatsApp API, Google services, CRMs, and more.

subServices.title: Database API Layers
subServices.description: Secure endpoints that manage database operations and data communication.

subServices.title: Authentication & Security
subServices.description: JWT auth, OAuth, session-based access, rate limiting, and encrypted communication.

subServices.title: External API Consumption
subServices.description: Consume third-party APIs and connect them to your dashboard or website.

serviceBenefits.title: Clean & Scalable Architecture
serviceBenefits.description: Our APIs are designed to grow with your business without performance issues.

serviceBenefits.title: Secure Data Protection
serviceBenefits.description: Enterprise-grade security ensures your business data stays safe.

serviceBenefits.title: Seamless Integrations
serviceBenefits.description: Smooth communication between systems for a unified workflow.

serviceBenefits.title: Future-Ready
serviceBenefits.description: Easy to extend, modify, or scale as your product evolves.

serviceProccess.title: Planning & API Architecture
serviceProccess.description: We map your data models, endpoints, and communication flow.

serviceProccess.title: Development
serviceProccess.description: We build APIs using Node.js, Express, and Next.js server functions.

serviceProccess.title: Security Implementation
serviceProccess.description: We implement authentication, encryption, and rate limiting.

serviceProccess.title: Testing
serviceProccess.description: We test endpoints for performance, load, and error handling.

serviceProccess.title: Deployment & Documentation
serviceProccess.description: Your API is deployed with full documentation for easy usage.

title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
text: Improve visibility, increase website traffic, and attract high-intent customers with effective SEO strategies.

detailPage.heroTitle: SEO Services That Drive Organic Growth
detailPage.heroSubTitle: We help businesses increase visibility, attract targeted customers, and rank higher on search engines through data-driven SEO strategies.

overview.title: Boost Your Search Visibility and Attract More Customers
overview.subTitle: Our SEO approach focuses on your business goals — not random keywords. We optimize your website to generate real measurable growth.
description: SEO isn't about ranking for everything — it's about ranking for what matters to your ideal customers.
With strong technical optimization, content structuring, and performance improvements, we ensure your website becomes a growth engine.

subServices.title: Technical SEO
subServices.description: Improve performance, crawlability, indexing, and website structure for maximum visibility.

subServices.title: On-Page SEO
subServices.description: Optimize titles, descriptions, content, images, and internal linking for better rankings.

subServices.title: Local SEO
subServices.description: Boost your ranking on Google Maps and local search results with targeted strategies.

subServices.title: Analytics & Reporting
subServices.description: Track keyword performance, traffic sources, and conversions with monthly reports.

subServices.title: Website Performance Optimization
subServices.description: Improve speed, Core Web Vitals, responsiveness, and user experience.

serviceBenefits.title: Rank Higher on Google
serviceBenefits.description: We optimize your website to increase visibility and search engine trust.

serviceBenefits.title: Increase Organic Traffic
serviceBenefits.description: Get more high-quality visitors who are actively searching for your services.

serviceBenefits.title: Improve Website Authority
serviceBenefits.description: Structured content, internal linking, and on-page optimization build trust.

serviceBenefits.title: Long-Term Growth
serviceBenefits.description: SEO delivers results that compound over time.

serviceProccess.title: SEO Audit
serviceProccess.description: A full technical and content audit to identify ranking opportunities.

serviceProccess.title: Keyword Strategy
serviceProccess.description: We target keywords that bring high-intent customers — not vanity metrics.

serviceProccess.title: On-Page Optimization
serviceProccess.description: We update tags, content, site structure, and media for better rankings.

serviceProccess.title: Technical Improvements
serviceProccess.description: Fix crawl issues, improve speed, and optimize Core Web Vitals.

serviceProccess.title: Monitoring & Reporting
serviceProccess.description: We track progress and refine the strategy monthly.
